description.brief: The Open Source Computer Vision Library

package.description:
This package contains the Open Source Computer Vision Library (opencv). This ROS package does not modify OpenCV in any way; it simply provides a convenient way to download and compile the library in a way that can be managed by the ROS dependency system.
I have patched the 1.0.0 release of OpenCV a tiny bit so it will happily compile/link with the latest FFmpeg (which is also wrapped in a ROS package).
package.author: Gary Bradski and many others. See web page for a full contributor list. ROS package maintained by Morgan Quigley.
